data.label: Huawei DTM
data.description: 华为动态标签管理器 Dynamic Tag Manager（DTM）是一个动态标签代码管理系统（Tag Manager System），您可以通过 Web 页面动态更新跟踪代码，轻松完成特定事件跟踪并将数据传送给第三方分析平台，实现营销数据随需监控。

data.label: Huawei DTM
data.description: Huawei Dynamic Tag Manager (DTM) is a dynamic tag code management system (Tag Manager System), allowing you to dynamically update tracking codes through a web page, easily complete specific event tracking, and transmit data to third-party analytics platforms, achieving on-demand monitoring of marketing data.
